thread.title: German union, employers in benchmark pay deal

title: German union, employers in benchmark pay deal
text:
German union, employers in benchmark pay deal Tuesday, February 06, 2018 - 01:46 
A hard-fought deal on pay and working hours for industrial employees in southwestern Germany sets a benchmark for millions of workers across Europe's largest economy and heralds wage growth in the coming years. David Pollard reports.   
A hard-fought deal on pay and working hours for industrial employees in southwestern Germany sets a benchmark for millions of workers across Europe's largest economy and heralds wage growth in the coming years. David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2BcNmrD
